comments:
In the RC2 version of Eclipse for OS X it isn't possible to change the layout of the 
package explorer ( Flat / Hierachical ). The action seems to stay. To quit eclipse 
subsequently sometimes produces an error message.

With the IB-Build of 20030227 it worked correctly.
Can you attach the error message that happens when you quit?

This seems to work fine for me. Could you provide more information, like which
plugins we are browsing and exact steps to reproduce it.

Thanks!

Created an attachment (id=3973)
Error Message while closing the eclipse ide

this is the output while closing the ide. But after restarting the Eclipse IDE,
the problem 
seems to be resolved. Now it's possible to switch between Flat / Hierarchical
layout. Could the problem be within the migration process of the old
workspace??

Please could attach the log file that is in your workspace 
(e.g ./metadata/.log)?

Thanks!

Created an attachment (id=4033)
the eclipse log file

Here's the logfile. Because I copied the workspaces from version to version,
only the
last entries are the logs  of RC 2

There are many exceptions in your log. I believe the one that is causing
your problem is:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Tree.getItems(Tree.java:532)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TreeItem.getItems(TreeItem.java:372)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.TreeViewer.getChildren(TreeViewer.java:112)
       ....

This problem is fixed in the latest (> 20030310). I'll close this bug. Please
reopen it if you can reproduce it in builds greater than 20030310.

Silenio
Approved by Mike and Veronika for RC3.
